info.author: hacktivistas
info.description:
How to insert the portlets into your site
==========================================

1. Install the product as described in INSTALL.txt

2. Go to the place of your site where you want to add a portlet
   and click on Manage Portlets.

3. Select "Classic portlet" in the "Add portlet..." dropdown.

4. Enter "lalistadesinde" in the "Template" field and "downloads", 
   "isohunt" or "piratebay" in the "Macro" field, depending on the 
   search box you want to display. Click Save.

Note you can insert more than one search box in your site repeating the steps
2-4 and entering a different key-name in "Macro".
info.name: lalistadesinde.portlet
info.summary: La lista de Sinde portlet for Plone
info.html_description:
1. Install the product as described in INSTALL.txt
  2. Go to the place of your site where you want to add a portlet and click on Manage Portlets.
  3. Select “Classic portlet” in the “Add portlet…” dropdown.
  4. Enter “lalistadesinde” in the “Template” field and “downloads”, “isohunt” or “piratebay” in the “Macro” field, depending on the search box you want to display. Click Save.

Note you can insert more than one search box in your site repeating the steps 2-4 and entering a different key-name in “Macro”.
